import React from 'react' import './TourCard.css' import {Card,CardBody} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city,photo,price,featured,avgRating,reviews} = tour return ( <>
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
) } export default TourCard
